016package edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.service;
017
018import android.content.Context;
019import android.content.SharedPreferences;
020import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
021import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
022import androidx.preference.PreferenceManager;
023import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
024import javax.inject.Inject;
025import javax.inject.Singleton;
026
027/**
028 * Implements a {@link LiveData}-based repository of preferences. It does not provide any preference
029 * mutation methods, and is of most use when all preferences are being modified through user
030 * interaction with an instance of a {@link androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat} subclass.
031 */
032@Singleton
033public class PreferencesRepository {
034
035  private final MutableLiveData<SharedPreferences> preferences;
036  private final SharedPreferences prefs;
037
038  @Inject
039  PreferencesRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
040    prefs = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(context);
041    preferences = new MutableLiveData<>(prefs);
042    prefs.registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener((prefs, key) -> preferences.postValue(prefs));
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Returns {@link LiveData} of all shared preferences that have been set in application code or by
047   * the user in a {@link androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat} subclass instance. A
048   * viewmodel should then use methods of {@link androidx.lifecycle.Transformations} (or similar
049   * mechanisms) to transform the entire {@link SharedPreferences} instance in the {@link LiveData}
050   * returned by this method to {@link LiveData} fields for individual preferences.
051   */
052  public LiveData<SharedPreferences> getPreferences() {
053    return preferences;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Allows pass-through read access to a specified (by key) value from the underlying
058   * {@link SharedPreferences}.
059   *
060   * @param key Permission {@link String} lookup key. 
061   * @param defaultValue Value to return if specified permission has not been set.
062   * @return Permission value (or {@code defaultValue}).
063   * @param <T> Permission type.
064   */
065  public <T> T get(String key, T defaultValue) {
066    //noinspection unchecked
067    T result = (T) prefs.getAll().get(key);
068    return (result != null) ? result : defaultValue;
069  }
070
071}
